caption.p: Effect of essential oil on hatching of M. incognita and M. javanica J2s after immersion in test solutions at the doses of 0, 62.5, 125, 250, 500, 1000 and 2000 Î¼L/L for 35 days. Bars with the same color followed by the same letter are not significantly different. Error bars represent the standard deviation of mean.
